nodes.text: Alex Maleev (born 1971) is a Bulgarian comic book artist who has collaborated with Charles Soule on the Marvel Comics limited series Star Wars: Lando. He has also drawn variant covers for the first issues of Marvel's main Star Wars series and Vader Down crossover event, as well as for the second issue of the Princess Leia miniseries.
Maleev is best known for illustrating Brian Michael Bendis' Daredevil run, and the two have also collaborated on Spider-Woman, Moon Knight, and Scarlet.
